Kim Jong-kook (born 25 April 1976) is a South Korean singer and TV personality.

He was initially part of the Korean duo Turbo, however, he later pursued a successful career as a solo artist.

Apart from being a 3 Daesang Award Winner Singer, he is also an active participant in variety shows such as X-man and Family Outing (since episode 19).

Currently, he is a cast member in the variety show, Running Man.

Girlfriend

A fortune teller on the South Korean TV Show “Running Man” predicted that stars Song Ji-hyo and Kim Jong-kook have an astonishing compatibility: over 80%!

This led fans to speculate on an actual marriage, and these comment were subsequently picked up by some media reporters who took them as facts. It was soon proved to be false, but it kept our hearts pounding for a while.

Kim Jong-kook, Yoon Eun Hye is the type of ideal. Kim Jong-kook is stated as follows about Yoon Eun-hye.

“I can actually when I was dating great if. If someone approached her, I thought I must protect her.”

Ex Girlfriend

Kim Jong-kook said: also Moon Geun-young.

“She is of 5.5 feet tall, not too thin, and the type of preference with a round face. I like her big eyes. Because my eyes are small.”

Ex Girlfriend 2

There is no rumor about his girlfriend.

He talks about his ideal woman on TV shows, but the real lover information is not reported at all.

His Ideal type of woman

Kim Jong-kook speaking in appearance, Yoon Eun Hye is the type of ideal.

Kim Jong-kook was a public confession to Yoon Eun-hye in the variety program, but refused.

How he thinks about marriage

He spoke with the elementary school fan has increased by variety program “Running Man,” he said that he also want children and get married.

Followed by Kim Jong Kook believes that “I want to live in” normal “rather than celebrities. Currently, please think that thinking is not yet to the marriage. If I want to get married, want to talk to clearly public”

, he added.

His/Her Ideal situation of dating

He doesn’t speak about his ideal situation of dating.

How his fan think about his lover

His fans are very concerning about his marriage because his age is alomost 40 years old.

But there is no rumor about his lover, that’s why his fans are so concerned about his love life.
